name: LoadingScreenTweaks
description: Hides various elements of your choice from Geometry Dash's loading screen.

configdir.name: Click me to open the Config Directory!
configdir.desc:
<cy>(Hopefully.)</c>
This setting does literally nothing new except being a button that acts as a shortcut to open the config directory for this mod (which is kind of important for using this mod properly, because this is where you will store your custom loading screen splash texts), because the legendary developers in the Geode Team themselves forgot to add a shortcut button that would have done this exact same thing, and I have gotten far too many folks (rightfully) asking me to find the config directory when using some of my other mods, and I hate repeating the same things over and over again, and I don't know if the next major update for Geode will also repeat this mistake where HJfod forgets to include a config directory shortcut button, so this setting and this button are here for extra insurance, so please enjoy this extra button, I guess. Anyway, by the time you're finished reading this, your device should be finished with opening the config directory; press "Aight" to close this window.

hideCocosAndFmod.name: Hide Cocos/FMOD Watermarks
hideCocosAndFmod.description: Hides the Cocos Engine and FMOD watermarks.

hideSplashText.name: Hide Splash Text
hideSplashText.description: Hides the loading screen splash text.

customSplashText.name: Custom Splash Text
customSplashText.description:
Toggles between custom loading screen splash text and RobTop's splash text.

(Enabling "Hide Splash Text" overrides this.)

custom.name: custom.txt Splash Texts
custom.description:
<cp>REQUIRES RESTART</c>

Includes your own custom loading screen splash text.
Please edit the "custom.txt" file by opening this mod's config directory.

customTextsOnly.name: Only Use custom.txt Splash Texts
customTextsOnly.description:
<cp>REQUIRES RESTART</c>

Only uses your own custom "New Best" texts from "custom.txt" file.

If no custom quotes are found, the mod will fall back to the default set of quotes.

default.name: Default Set of Splash Texts
default.description: Includes the default set of Splash Texts from this mod.

stanleyCeleste.name: The Stanley Parable + Celeste
stanleyCeleste.description:
<cp>REQUIRES RESTART</c>

Includes quotes from Celeste and The Stanley Parable.

futurama.name: Futurama
futurama.description:
<cp>REQUIRES RESTART</c>

Includes splash texts inspired by Futurama's title captions.

snl50.name: SNL50
snl50.description:
<cp>REQUIRES RESTART</c>

Includes quotes from Saturday Night Live (one from each season, hopefully).

customFont.name: Splash Text Font #
customFont.description:
Sets the font of all loading screen splash text messages. Default is 0 (falls back to <cl>goldFont</c>, as seen in vanilla Geometry Dash).

Notes:
- <cj>-1 for Pusab, -2 for chatFont.</c>
- <cy>To use font numbers greater than 0: refer to the level editor for the font each number corresponds to, subtract that number by 1, and then put it here.</c>

customFontGoldColor.name: Gold Color (Non-Golden Pusab Fonts)
customFontGoldColor.description: Applies something close to the gold color loading screen splash text messages <cp>only if your setting for "'New Best' Text Font #" is not 0</c>.

multiline.name: Multiline Splash Text
multiline.description: Custom splash texts can either become multiline splash texts (if this is enabled) or be limited to one line (if this is disabled). Here is where you make that decision.

loadingProgressText.name: Loading Progress Percentage Text
loadingProgressText.description:
Adds text to the LoadingLayer indicating the loading progress.

<cy>(May not be accurate, use at your own risk.)</c>

loadStepText.name: Load Step Progress Text
loadStepText.description:
Adds text to the LoadingLayer indicating the load step progress.

<cy>(May not be accurate, use at your own risk.)</c>

loadingProgressTextOffsetX.name: Loading Progress Text Position Offset (X)
loadingProgressTextOffsetX.description: X-position offset for this mod's loading progress text. Intended for Android users whose camera or corner may be blocking the loading progress text.

loadingProgressTextOffsetY.name: Loading Progress Text Position Offset (Y)
loadingProgressTextOffsetY.description: Y-position offset for this mod's loading progress text. Intended for Android users whose camera or corner may be blocking the loading progress text.

issues.info: To disable hyphen prefixes and suffixes in custom messages, edit saved.json. For other issues, ping me <cl>(@erymanthus)</c> in the Geode SDK Discord server's <cl>#help</c> channel if you need help. <cr>DMs are NOT accepted.</c>
